mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_pay_alipay_log ( id, trade_no, orderid, notify_id, notify_time, notify_type, trade_status, total_fee, gmt_payment, buyer_email, buyer_id, createtime ) VALUES ( #{log.id:VARCHAR}, #{log.trade_no:VARCHAR}, #{log.orderid:VARCHAR}, #{log.notify_id:VARCHAR}, #{log.notify_time:VARCHAR}, #{log.notify_type:VARCHAR}, #{log.trade_status:VARCHAR}, #{log.total_fee:VARCHAR}, #{log.gmt_payment:VARCHAR}, #{log.buyer_email:VARCHAR}, #{log.buyer_id:VARCHAR}, #{log.createtime:VARCHAR} )
